about_the_game:
Rolling hills, golden meadows and seaside views await along Britain’s longest standard gauge preserved line; the West Somerset Railway. Now fully remastered as part of a free update, operate heritage galas with classic British traction and take in the all-new and volumetric Somerset skies, enhanced foliage and more in Train Sim World 4!

Keep tourists entertained with a diesel-bashing display of powerful locomotives! The standard timetable for West Somerset Railway lets you experience a thrilling diesel gala; drive the iconic Class 47 and Class 09, as well as other British classics from your collection such as the Class 33, Class 52 and change gears by experiencing Tees Valley Line’s Class 101.

Go further into the past and recreate the romantic era of steam, as an all-new second timetable now brings steam gala potential to West Somerset! Owners of historical Add-Ons such as Peak Forest and West Cornwall Steam Railtour will find the line populated with powerful steam; drive the Jubilee, 8F and 4F on passenger and demonstration freight services, and of course, the World-famous Flying Scotsman also makes an appearance!

Already beautiful since its original introduction into Train Sim World, now the West Somerset Railway has been brought fully up to TSW4 standards. Packed with extra detail throughout such as rebuilt Minehead Town, Watchet Harbour and Bishops Lydeard industrial estate, water tower and train shed. Combine that with volumetric skies, lighting and fog, updated ground snow and windscreen rain effects; as well as an overhaul of foliage, it feels like a brand-new route!

Key Features


  • Full heritage West Somerset Railway route from Norten Fitzwarren to Minehead
  • BR Class 47 and BR Class 09 locomotives in preserved British Railways Green liveries
  • BR Mk1 coaches in Chocolate & Cream and Crimson & Cream liveries
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials
  • 6 engaging Scenarios and a diesel gala Timetable, which additionally makes use of other British diesels
  • Bonus authentic steam gala timetable which makes use of Peak Forest, West Cornwall Railtour and Flying Scotsman
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam
  • Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 1.7 GB
